abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "MediaType is Audio", "TaxonKey is Columbiformes" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from My naturesounds - nature observations with sound recordings 1 records from Estonian Ornithological Society (BirdLife Estonia) 1 records from Automatic acoustic Monitoring and Inventoring of BIODiversity 3 records from PlutoF platform reference-based occurrences 17 records from MVZ Bird Observations (Arctos) 82 records from Australian National Wildlife Collection provider for OZCAM 205 records from Animal Sound Archive 352 records from Colección de Sonidos Ambientales del Instituto de Investigación de Recursos Biológicos Alexander von Humboldt (IAvH-CSA) 414 records from Borror Lab of Bioacoustics (BLB), Ohio State University 1968 records from iNaturalist Research-grade Observations 9045 records from Xeno-canto - Bird sounds from around the world
